title: minerjones
author: minerjones
created_time: November 13, 2022, 08:03:10 PMLast edit: August 06, 2023, 03:02:32 PM by minerjones
content: For sale are some nice 3D printed LTC themed hardware wallets cases.Right now there are ones for OpenDime, Ledger Nano S, and Trezor OneThese were made by Moparmining for the LTC Conference that happened in Vegas at the end of OctoberWe were unable to attend...So are offering them to the forum! Half of the proceeds will be donated to the LTC Foundation once sales have completedIn stock: 3x OpenDime cases  7x Ledger Nano S cases 7x Trezor Model One cases50x KeychainsEach case is $15 and comes with 1 free LTC keychain as seen in the picture.Keychains can be purchased for $2 eachThere are also 4x Ledger Nano S hardware wallets available (sealed/NIB) for $40 eachMore cases will be available soon and BTC ones are in the works!!  BTC, LTC, and BTC-LN accepted

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Any LTC fans out there?Get some protection for your bits today!!

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Celebrate the Litecoin Halving with some protection for your LTC!!
